CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 值；数值；价值；面值；标准；准则；重要性；[艺术]色彩深浅；明暗度；（货币的）购买力；[音乐]音值；[语言学]语值；[哲学]价值观；[经济学]价值量
评估价值；估算价值；给…估价；给…定价；重视；珍视

synonym.mean: 值；价值；价格；重要性；确切涵义

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有价值的；贵重的；可估价的
重要的；宝贵的；贵重的；经估价的
无价值的；不值钱的；微不足道的
评价者；估价者；价格核定人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 与appraise相似，指使判断绝对准确，但多用于对人物的某方面的评价，很少用于评价某物的市场价值。
专指评定价值等级的高低。
侧重指一般人对某物的价值或价格所作的估计。
原义指对为确定交多少税而估计，引申指通过估价以便更好利用。
通常指由个人作出的主观估价。
指以专家身份作了最终精确的估价。
侧重指使用价值，着重人、物或事所具有的重要性、用途或优秀品质等。
与value近义，但前者强调事物本身的价值。

word_group.brief_definition: 票面价值；面值；表面价值；字面意思
退保现金价值；退保金额

bilingual.target: 它们的价值并不总是重要的。

bilingual.source: While some say contemporary art lacks skill, meaning and artistic value, others argue that its worth lies in its ability to stimulate new discussions.
bilingual.target: 有些人认为当代艺术缺乏技巧、意义和艺术价值，而另一些人则认为它的价值在于能够激发新的讨论。

bilingual.source: You should know the value of time.
bilingual.target: 你应该知道时间的价值。

bilingual.source: The value of this painting is very high.

bilingual.target: 这本书有很高的实用价值。
这种草药有很好的药用价值。
这本书具有很高的收藏价值。
他的艺术作品缺乏商业性价值。
每个人都有自己的个人价值。

bilingual.source: The value of the currency fluctuates daily.
bilingual.target: 货币的价值每天都在波动。

list.abstract: value，英语单词，意思是价值，价格，重要性，评价，估价，重视，用途。

yingyinNormal.en: What else should a company value but profits?
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了盈利以外，作为一个公司还能有什么价值？

yingyinNormal.en: Look. You know me. I look for value wherever it can be found.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你了解我，我...我会寻找一切投资价值。

yingyinNormal.en: Because while economics has some value some explanatory power, it's not everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然经济学有一些价值，能够解释一些现象但它是不充分的。

yingyinNormal.en: It makes us value it more and this excitement cause us many times to behave and get it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这使得物品更有价值，此模式我们经历过很多，消费者也都愿意购买。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, I think Eric's employing a broad-based concept of value of friendship taking priority...
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，我觉得艾瑞克是在阐述友谊广泛意义上的价值，要优先……

yingyinNormal.en: All calories are not the same and the calories in coca-cola products has no nutritional value.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是所有的卡路里都是相同的，而且在可口可乐中的卡路里并没有营养价值。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《可口可乐史上最诚实的广告》

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, grandma says that there's value in just one thing, that you appreciate it more because there's just one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 奶奶说一件东西才有价值，因为你会因它的独一无二而欣赏它。

yingyinNormal.en: And so the CDOs that you create are of the highest quality and the highest value. Absolutely. Yep. Absolutely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你发行的债务担保是质量最好价值最高的。绝对的。绝对的。

yingyinNormal.en: Looking around, this place seems like a sign of troubled times. Paper is what's called a low-value good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看这周围，这地方好像度过过一段艰难的时光。纸被称为低价值产品。

yingyinNormal.en: And the channels you're least investing in are adding enormous value in segments that currently appear to have low value but actually have the highest spending potential.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吸引投资最少，投入了巨大财力的环节，现在看来创造的价值却是最少的，但实际上有很高的消费潜力。

yingyinNormal.en: If the total amount of currency in circulation increases faster than the total value of goods and services in the economy,
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果流通的货币总数增加得比经济体中的商品和服务价值还要快。

yingyinNormal.en: If the total amount of currency in circulation increases faster than the total value of goods and services in the economy,
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果流通的货币总数增加得比经济体中的商品和服务价值还要快，

yingyinNormal.en: He specializes in high-value manufacturing, in goods that are worth far more than the cost of their raw materials.
yingyinNormal.zh: 主要是高端产品制造业，那些产品价值都要偏高，相比起它们的原材料。

yingyinNormal.en: You understand that I wanted to do something else that was important to me, even though you didn't see the value in it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您也应该理解我也想做其它对我来说很重要的事，尽管您没看到其中的价值。

yingyinNormal.en: No. The governor's endorsing you because he doesn't like Castro. I am establishing your value through the shooting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，州长支持你是因为他不喜欢卡斯特罗，我通过那次枪击事件确立了你的价值。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought it was cheesy, production value was low and the singers couldn't belt like Axl Rose or Mariah Carey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得这很差，没有产品价值，歌星也不能像艾克索·罗斯或者玛丽亚·凯莉一样放声大唱。

yingyinNormal.en: He said he wouldn't pay for my lawyer. Then he told me to come here and learn about the value of money from the one daughter he's actually proud off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说不帮我付律师费，还叫我来跟他唯一自豪的女儿学学金钱的价值。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't give a rat's ass about the hosts. It's our little research project that Delos cares about. That's where the real value is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一点也不在乎什么接待员，提洛公司在乎的是研究项目，这才是真正有价值的。

yingyinNormal.en: I paid $200 for my share. Dude, everybody knows a time machine loses half its value the minute you drive it off the lot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的股份当时是200美金。小子，大家都知道时间机器会因为转让而贬低一半的价值。

yingyinNormal.en: And if that person has the ability to snap his fingers and erase the value of that empire, you have to make sure you have a contingency.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果这个人有动动手指就能抹去整个帝国价值的能力，你得确保你有应急措施。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 价值; 价格; 意义

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 贬低；降低…的价值；降低…的重要性；使（货币）贬值
adj. 贵重的；值钱的；非常重要的；非常有用的

word_family.mean: n. 重要性；珍贵性；价值观念；标准；值；时值；确切意义；明暗度；价值

sense_info_list.zh: 价值; 价格; 意义

examination_example.sentence: To use more robots to grow high-<highlight>value</highlight> crops.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用更多的机器人种植高价值的作物。

examination_example.sentence: Production of corn, cotton, rice, soybeans, and wheat has been largely mechanized, but many high-<highlight>value</highlight>, labor-intensive crops, such as strawberries, need labor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玉米、棉花、水稻、大豆和小麦的生产在很大程度上已经机械化，但许多高价值、劳动密集型作物，如草莓，则需要劳动力。

examination_example.sentence: The words that have mattered are efficiency, flexibility, shareholder <highlight>value</highlight>, business-friendly, wealth generation, sales, impact and, in newspapers, circulation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最重要的词语是效率、灵活性、股东价值、商业友好、财富创造、销售、影响力，以及在报纸上的发行量。

sense_info_list.en: a person's principles or standards of behavior

examination_example.sentence: To put it another way: How can we make sure that the thinking of intelligent machines reflects humanity's highest <highlight>values</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说：我们如何确保智能机器的思维反映了人类的最高价值观？

examination_example.sentence: Now we can understand each other's positions and recognize our shared <highlight>values</highlight>, since we both care about needy workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我们可以理解彼此的立场，并认识到我们共同的价值观，因为我们都关心贫困的工人。

examination_example.sentence: You live in your skin, think your own thoughts, have your own <highlight>values</highlight> and make your own choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你做自己，思考自己的想法，拥有自己的价值观，做出自己的选择。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, rushing to get your own ideas out there can cause colleagues to feel you don't <highlight>value</highlight> their opinions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，急于表达自己的想法会让同事觉得你不重视他们的意见。

examination_example.sentence: While their parents were content to work long hours, young people <highlight>value</highlight> flexibility.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然他们的父母满足于长时间工作，但年轻人更看重弹性。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Value</highlight> the present moment and remember how fortunate you are to be alive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍惜当下，记住你活着是多么幸运。

sense_info_list.en: the amount of money that can be received for something

word_usage.usage: value作动词指“重视；珍视”时，不用于进行时。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 贬低；降低…的价值；降低…的重要性；使（货币）贬值
n. 估价；评定价值；估定价值
v. 对…再估价；对… 重新评价；调整（货币）价值
adj. 贵重的；值钱的；非常重要的；非常有用的

word_family.mean: n. 重要性；珍贵性；价值观念；标准；值；时值；确切意义；明暗度；价值

examination_example.sentence: Because if we aren't, we won't be providing much <highlight>value</highlight> in future ecosystems, and that may put in question the foundation for our existence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不这样做，我们就无法在未来的生态系统中提供太多的价值，这将撼动我们存在于世的根基。

examination_example.sentence: Extending the life of a pair of jeans allows the consumer to get more <highlight>value</highlight> out of their product.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 延长牛仔裤的使用寿命能让消费者享受到产品的超值服务。

examination_example.sentence: They want to make their customers interested in preserving their products and preventing things that still have <highlight>value</highlight> from going to the garbage dump.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些服装类、鞋类、电子产业类的零售商和生产商旨在让他们的消费者注意对产品的保护，防止商品还没真正用完就丢掉，造成浪费。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>value</highlight> of one more of those people is very high.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样的人才再多一个的价值很高。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>value</highlight> of what the student can produce is reflected in the wage employers are willing to pay the student to produce it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生可以创造的价值体现在雇主愿意支付的工资上。

examination_example.sentence: Many have argued that the women designers of this time were able to project their own clothing <highlight>values</highlight> into a new style.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人认为，这个时代的女性设计师能够将自己的服装价值观念设计成新的风格。

examination_example.sentence: System institutions are operating very efficiently based on this analysis, raising the question of the <highlight>value</highlight> of pursuing a broad scale outsourcing initiative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于这一分析，董事系统机构运作得非常有效率，这引发了推行大规模外包计划的价值问题。

sense_info_list.en: a person's principles or standards of behavior

examination_example.sentence: Nationality is less useful than socio-economic status as an indicator of one's <highlight>values</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为个人价值观的指标，国籍不如社会经济状况有用。

examination_example.sentence: The impact of social progress on one's <highlight>values</highlight> was ignored.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社会进步对个人价值观的影响被忽视了。

examination_example.sentence: This boosts the reputation and image of Adidas by making people more aware of the company's <highlight>values</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过这种方式让更多消费者了解公司的价值理念，提升企业声誉，树立品牌形象。

examination_example.sentence: This teaches them to <highlight>value</highlight> the effort as well as what it achieves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这教会他们珍惜努力以及所取得的成就。

examination_example.sentence: Reason and thought were most <highlight>valued</highlight> in this garden—all derived from the project of the Enlightenment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这座花园里，理性和思想最受重视——一切都源于启蒙运动。

examination_example.sentence: The limited research conducted thus far indicates they're especially dominant among those who <highlight>value</highlight> independence over cooperation, and harmony over confrontation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，进行中的有限研究表明，在那些看重独立而不是合作、看重和谐而不是对抗的人中，他们尤其占优势。

sense_info_list.en: the amount of money that can be received for something

examination_example.sentence: Together, the <highlight>value</highlight> of these metals is estimated to be about S52 billion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些金属估计价值520亿美元左右。

word_usage.usage:
value表示有价值的意思，与of连用时，不能省略of。如：
It is of no value.
这个没有价值。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 贵重的；值钱的；非常重要的；非常有用的
v. 低估；看轻；对…估价过低

word_family.mean: n. 重要性；珍贵性；价值观念；标准；值；时值；确切意义；明暗度；价值

examination_example.sentence: The decoy effect works because of the way our brains assign <highlight>value</highlight> when making choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 诱饵效应之所以有效，是因为我们的大脑在做出选择时分配价值的方式。

examination_example.sentence: One reason may be breakfast's nutritional <highlight>value</highlight> — partly because cereal is fortified (增加营养价值) with vitamins.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个原因可能是因为早餐营养价值高，部分因为早餐谷物片添加了维生素。

examination_example.sentence: Archiving practices have changed greatly since the 1970s, and we keep our high <highlight>value</highlight> documents in a safe that I don't even have access to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自20世纪70年代以来，存档方式已经发生了很大的变化，而且我们把高价值文件保存在一个我都无法进入的保险箱里。

sense_info_list.en: a person's principles or standards of behavior

examination_example.sentence: If these are truly the <highlight>values</highlight> of many young people, then their behavior doesn't match their beliefs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这些真的是许多年轻人的价值观，那么他们的行为就与他们的信仰不符。

examination_example.sentence: As Millennial women come of age they share many of the same views and <highlight>values</highlight> about work as their male counterparts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着千禧一代年轻女性逐渐成熟，她们对于工作的许多看法和价值观都与同龄男性相同。

examination_example.sentence: Some robots are already programmed with basic human <highlight>values</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些机器人已经被设定了人类的基本价值观。

examination_example.sentence: When we use the same praise repeatedly , it may become empty and no longer <highlight>valued</highlight> by the child.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们反复用相同的话表扬孩子，它(表扬)就可能会变得空洞，不再受到孩子的重视。

examination_example.sentence: In the pediatricians' view, essentially every life skill that's <highlight>valued</highlight> in adults can be built up with play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在儿科医生看来，基本上每一项成人所重视的生活技能都可以通过玩耍来培养。

examination_example.sentence: Highlighting, Post-It notes, dog-ears and other techniques allow for further customization that students <highlight>value</highlight> in print books over digital forms of books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生们可以通过划重点、贴便条、折书角和其它方法进一步定制自己的课本，这正是学生们觉得印刷书比数码书更有价值的地方。

sense_info_list.en: the amount of money that can be received for something

examination_example.sentence: And then founded the food-delivery start-up Munchery, which is <highlight>valued</highlight> at $ 300 million.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后创立了估价3亿美元的食品配送初创公司麦奇里。

examination_example.sentence: The 77-pound giant pearl that he'd kept hidden in his run-down wooden house was the biggest pearl in the world, which was <highlight>valued</highlight> at 76 million pounds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他藏在破旧木屋里的77磅重的巨大珍珠是世界上最大的珍珠，估价为7600万英镑。

examination_example.sentence: By examining its <highlight>value</highlight> equation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过测定它的价值方程。

examination_example.sentence: If more options are introduced, the <highlight>value</highlight> equation changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果引入更多的选项，等式的数值就会改变。

examination_example.sentence: "You would want that robot preloaded with a good set of <highlight>values</highlight>, " said Russell.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “你会希望机器人预装一套好的数值，”罗素说。

examination_example.sentence: Nobody places much <highlight>value</highlight> on the lives of these poor birds or on their meat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有人重视这些可怜的鸟的生命或它们的肉。

word_usage.usage:
value表示有价值的意思，与of连用时，不能省略of。如：
It is of no value.
这个没有价值。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 贵重的；值钱的；非常重要的；非常有用的

word_family.mean: n. 重要性；珍贵性；价值观念；标准；值；时值；确切意义；明暗度；价值

examination_example.sentence: Cattle tend to be kept in remote places and their <highlight>value</highlight> has risen, making them appealing targets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 牛往往被饲养在偏远的地方，它们的价值也在上升，这使它们成为吸引人的目标。

examination_example.sentence: Art products differ from most other commercial products because they have both commercial and cultural <highlight>values</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术产品不同于大多数其他商业产品，因为它们既有商业价值，也有文化价值。

examination_example.sentence: He learned the <highlight>value</highlight> and beauty of nature there from a very young age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他从很小的时候就了解到在那里自然的价值和美丽。

examination_example.sentence: They were performing a calculation, not just memorizing the <highlight>value</highlight> of each combination.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在进行计算，而不仅仅是记住每个组合的值。

examination_example.sentence: They noticed that the monkeys tended to underestimate (低估) a sum compared with a single symbol when the two were close in <highlight>value</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们注意到猴子往往低估了当两个符号的值接近时，与单个符号进行比较的总和。

examination_example.sentence: Persons in other cultural groups <highlight>value</highlight> silence and view it as necessary for understanding a person's needs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他文化群体的人重视沉默，认为沉默是理解一个人需求的必要条件。

examination_example.sentence: Many Native Americans <highlight>value</highlight> silence and feel it is a basic part of communicating among people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多美国本地人重视沉默，认为这是人与人之间交流的一个基本部分。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 贵重的；宝贵的；受到尊重的；经估价的
adj. 贵重的；值钱的；非常重要的；非常有用的

word_family.mean: n. 重要性；珍贵性；价值观念；标准；值；时值；确切意义；明暗度；价值

examination_example.sentence: The Book of Poetry, the earliest collection of poems, is of great <highlight>value</highlight> in Chinese history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《诗经》是中国最早的诗集，在中国历史上具有重要价值。

examination_example.sentence: In the American culture, people put a higher <highlight>value</highlight> on work than on sleep．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国文化中，比起睡眠，人们更重视工作。

examination_example.sentence: Albert Einstein once said, "Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of <highlight>value</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦曾经说过:“不要试图成为一个成功的人，而要努力成为一个有价值的人。

examination_example.sentence: People might <highlight>value</highlight> their traditional festivals more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们可能会更加重视他们的传统节日。

examination_example.sentence: For those who <highlight>value</highlight> work more than sleep, they should listen to what a famous person once said．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于这些把工作看的比睡眠更重要的人来说，他们应该听一位名人说过的话。

examination_example.sentence: They've been friends for many years and they both <highlight>value</highlight> their friendship very much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们是多年的朋友，都非常珍惜他们之间的友谊。

sense_info_list.en: a person's principles or standards of behavior

examination_example.sentence: In the past 3,500 years, China has developed its own form of cultural traditions, <highlight>values</highlight> and tastes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去的3500年里，中国形成了自己的文化传统、价值观和品味。

examination_example.sentence: Choose an organization with the same interests and common <highlight>values</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选择一个兴趣相同，价值观相同的组织。

examination_example.sentence: Join in a group with different <highlight>values</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加入一个价值观不同的团体。

sense_info_list.en: the amount of money that can be received for something

examination_example.sentence: Is that <highlight>value</highlight> for money?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这物有所值吗？

examination_example.sentence: I know, but it was really good <highlight>value</highlight>—only 30 dollars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我知道，但它真的物有所值——只要30美元。

word_usage.usage:
value表示有价值的意思，与of连用时，不能省略of。如：
It is of no value.
这个没有价值。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 与value近义，但worth强调事物本身的价值。
侧重使用价值，着重指人、事、物所具有的重要性、有用性或优秀品质等。
